game_description: Welcome to Penguin Rush! Slide on ice, race with friends, go rock climbing, do parkour, throw snowballs at fellow penguins and so much more! This game uses gorilla tag movement so watch your surroundings! Also go join the discord! https://discord.gg/wyk6VCWsfx
review_1: Piz ad more updates great game and fix glitch were other penguins are invisible love game so. Much I even play daily more people should play love backrooms can I maybe have mod best game ever I watch every penguin rush video I can love game so much
review_2: Don't download the game guys it's terrible
review_3: The game was really laggy when I entered in I can't even type my name on the keyboard
review_4: Back then I used to go with my friends the backrooms like racing the giant spider with the evil penguins but the game is now gone what happened. lags, your hands won’t appear￼￼, you can’t join lobbies and this game is probably discontinued. Please bring this back￼. Same thing happened to Penguin game to￼ lost files￼.
